name: claude-prompts
description: Hot-reloadable prompts with structured reasoning (CAGEERF, ReACT), quality gates, and chain workflows
long_description: Turn your prompt library into a programmable engine. Hot-reload for live editing, symbolic command syntax (>>prompt --> >>chain @framework :: 'gate'), methodology injection, and self-evaluating quality gates. Supports version history, rollback, and resource selection with %judge.

tools.name: prompt_engine
tools.description: Execute prompts with frameworks, gates, and chains. Supports symbolic syntax (>>prompt --> >>chain).

tools.description: CRUD operations for prompts, gates, and methodologies. Manage templates and workflows.

tools.description: Framework management, analytics, status, and configuration inspection.
